record player. John was a great singer and a great guitarist. His dream was to get some very good records. He was asked by a producer about some good music and they agreed. John was given the lead role in a record company. He was happy to hear that.

Like Mommy. I was driving down the street and I saw a lady with a brown wig. I started to cry when she didn't see me. However, I made a huge smile and thanked her. When she saw it, she was shocked. Her mother said that I did not see a wig.

20 years and still in love. It was her first girlfriend's birthday. Her parents told her she should only meet her friends at her new house. She was very excited and nervous. Her parents were very proud of her. She was happy to have done it.
